Text.Text: The People's Tribune - This legendary reformer supercharges your factories with revolutionary efficiency that turns your production lines into unstoppable engines of prosperity!
Brother of Reform - Following his brother's legacy, this champion of the people summons eager workers to your Coopers and Cookhouses, ensuring food and drink flow like the Tiber itself!
Mother of Heroes - The matriarch of the Gracchi brings her legendary wisdom to Albion, rallying skilled laborers to your workshops and transforming them into beacons of excellence!
Grandfather of Legends - The great Scipio Africanus blesses your residences with his legendary aura, elevating happiness, health, fire safety, knowledge, piety, and prestige to glorious heights!
Mistress of Logistics - This brilliant strategist supercharges all warehouses across the island, ensuring goods flow as swiftly as Roman legions conquering the world!

Admiral Supreme - The first Roman naval victor transforms heavy warships into legendary flagships! Grants incredible speed, devastating firepower, enhanced hull strength, expanded cargo capacity, superior vision range, and minimal upkeep. Your enemies will flee at the sight of your sails! (Large warships only)
